title: Create fabulous recipes in your Luxury kitchen, Pet Friendly
posting_body: Located just minutes from Downtown Napa, our community lets you live a resort lifestyle all year round.
Savor all of life's moments from stunning sunsets to walk along the Napa River, a tasting at one of the local wineries, or stroll through charming downtown.
At home, enjoy luxury finishes and community spaces to relax and mingle.
Visit This Website to See More:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 767+ Sq.
- -Polished quartz countertops in kitchen and baths
- -Wood-style plank flooring in the living spaces
- -Fitness center with top-of-the-line cardio and strength training equipment*
- -Social lounge with kitchen and game room*
- -Outdoor lounge with fire pit, bocce ball court, and grills
Please visit our website for additional details.
While we are open for self-guided, virtual and in-person tours, they are by appointment only.
Please call us or schedule a tour on our website to visit the property in person.
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
